name: LyteYear
tagline: Big brand marketing expertise at startup prices.
description:
We're a boutique consultancy that specializes in specific digital marketing channels. Each of us 'put in time' building our expertise at big brands, tech giants, and agencies. After mastering our channels, we then separately began taking on our own clients, and ultimately decided to partner. We're based all over the world, and have expertise across industries and companies - from Fortune 50 eCommerce retailers to newly launched startups.
We also partner with agencies to audit their current digital marketing offerings, or to step in as their digital marketing experts. Our core channels of expertise are: SEO, SEM, ASO and mobile growth, AMS, paid Facebook, paid Instagram, and paid LinkedIn. 
READ MORE...
